info.brief_description:
shrunk at a cheerleader slumber party 
will you survive?
info.description:
your name is Josh.your about 18 years old.
while hanging out with your best friend joey he shows you something weird that he found a toy gun that says shrink on it
you go down stairs and accordantly shrink that would've be a problem expect of the slumber part going down which now your apart of

sally : shorter then Amanda loves to fart

No GAY stuff no sexual insertion stick to feet and butt crushing
have fun
